# FLASH

# undetect
@ 0   0   0

# nodata
@ 255 255 255 

# Land-to-cloud
-64.0	255 160 255 
-32.0	255 160 248 
-16.0	255 160 240 
 -8.0	255 160 224 
 -4.0	255 160 192 
 -2.0	255 160 208 
 -1.0	255 160 240 
 -0.5	240 160 254 

# Cloud-to-land
+0.5	224   160 255
 +1.0	192   160 255 
 +2.0	192   176 255
 +4.0	170   176 255 
 +8.0	144   176 255  
+16.0	144   192 255 
+32.0	160   192 255
